mapper.sql: i.id, i.title, FORMAT(i.price/100,2) AS priceView, FORMAT(i.normal_price/100,2) AS normalPriceView, i.image, i.sold_num AS soldNum, FORMAT(i.coupon/100,2) AS couponView, i.sum, c.name AS catName, u.username as userName, a.name AS activityName, i.updated, i.stale, i.url, DATE_FORMAT(i.created,'%Y-%m-%d') as createdString, CASE i.status WHEN 1 THEN "正常" WHEN 2 THEN "待审核" WHEN 3 THEN "下架" WHEN 4 THEN "已删除" ELSE "未知" END AS statusName
mapper.select: SELECT i.id, i.title, i.price, i.normal_price as normalPrice, i.coupon, i.sold_num as soldNum, i.image, c.name as catName, a.name as activityName FROM tb_item i LEFT JOIN tb_item_cat c ON i.cid = c.id LEFT JOIN tb_item_activity a ON i.aid=a.id WHERE i.status = 1 order by i.id desc
